description: Number of addition triangles with apex n (version 1).
comments: An addition triangle has any set of positive numbers as base; other rows are formed by adding pairs of adjacent numbers.Reversing the base counts as a different triangle.
crossrefs: Cf. A028307, A066411, see A062896 for version 2.
